body:
we need a bit more information about your setup. can you please use this template for reporting the bug? https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md
thanks

### expected behaviour
no fatals being thrown

### actual behaviour
ownclouds log gets spammed with fatals like
```
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#398","level":4,"time":1362356244}
```

### steps to reproduce
1. use owncloud
2. see log
3. 

### server configuration
operating system:
opensuse
web server: 
nginx
database:
sqlite
php version:
5.3.22
owncloud version:
5.0-rc1
### client configuration
browser:
all
operating system:
all
### logs
#### web server error log
```
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /apps-git/news/img/news.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/index.php/apps/notes" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /settings/img/personal.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /core/img/logo-wide.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /core/img/actions/logout.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/index.php/apps/notes" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /core/img/actions/caret.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/index.php/apps/files" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"
1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /settings/img/apps.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"

1.2.3.4 - - [04/mar/2013:11:09:00 +0100] "get /index.php/core/routes.json http/1.1" 304 0 "https://example.com/index.php/settings/apps?installed" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.31 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/26.0.1411.0 safari/537.31 suse/26.0.1411.0"

```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/home\/http\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#398","level":4,"time":1362391658}
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/home\/http\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#398","level":4,"time":1362391659}

{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/home\/http\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#398","level":4,"time":1362391740}
```

#### browser log
nothing related

@kondou-ger magic_quotes_gpc is deprecated in 5.3. it is sane to turn this setting off as it's off since php 5.4.
http://www.php.net/manual/en/info.configuration.php#ini.magic-quotes-gpc
